title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.185 - Access
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.185 - Access

State Regulations

The permit-issuing official or his designated representative is to be permitted access, for purposes of inspection, at all times while the food vending commissary or food vending operation in his area of jurisdiction is in operation, whether open to the public for service of food or not. Refusal of admittance, after proper identification, is cause for action to obtain permit revocation and an order to close. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.185

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
